column2: SELECT s.fname, s.lname, c.name AS coursename, c.YHP, c.description FROM students s JOIN students_courses sc ON sc.studentsid = s.id JOIN courses c ON sc.coursesid = c.id WHERE s.fname = '{0}' AND s.lname = '{1}'

SELECT s.fname, s.lname, c.name AS coursename, c.YHP, c.description FROM teachers t JOIN teachers_courses tc ON tc.teachersid = t.id JOIN courses c ON tc.coursesid = c.id WHERE t.fname = '{0}' AND t.lname = '{1}'
SELECT t.fname, t.lname, c.name AS coursename, c.YHP, c.description FROM teachers t JOIN teachers_courses tc ON tc.teachersid = t.id JOIN courses c ON tc.coursesid = c.id
SELECT s.fname, s.lname, c.name AS coursename, c.YHP, c.description FROM students s JOIN students_courses sc ON sc.studentsid = s.id JOIN courses c ON sc.coursesid = c.id

SELECT s.id AS student_id, s.fname AS student_fname, s.lname AS student_lname, t.id AS teacher_id, t.fname AS teacher_fname, t.lname AS teacher_lname, c.id AS course_id, c.name AS course_name FROM students s JOIN students_courses sc ON s.id = sc.studentsid JOIN courses c ON sc.coursesid = c.id LEFT JOIN teachers_courses tc ON c.id = tc.coursesid LEFT JOIN teachers t ON tc.teachersid = t.id WHERE c.id IN (SELECT coursesid FROM students_courses WHERE studentsid = (SELECT id FROM students WHERE username = '{0}' AND password = '{1}')) ORDER BY s.id
SELECT 'Students' AS source, id, fname, lname, town, hobby, email, phone FROM students UNION ALL SELECT 'Courses' AS source, id, name, YHP, description, NULL, NULL, NULL FROM courses ORDER BY source
Select * FROM students s WHERE s.username='{0}' AND s.password='{1}'
Select * FROM teachers t WHERE t.username='{0}' AND t.password='{1}'
INSERT INTO students_courses (studentsid, coursesid) SELECT s.id AS studentsid, c.id AS subjectsid FROM students s JOIN courses c ON s.fname = ? AND s.lname = ? AND c.name = ?
INSERT INTO teachers_courses (teachersid, coursesid) SELECT t.id AS teachersid, c.id AS subjectsid FROM teachers t JOIN courses c ON t.fname = ? AND t.lname = ? AND c.name = ?
